Comment: This is the plugin's working path relative to $buildDir. Use the distribution plugin or a custom implementation to copy necessary files to an output resolve instead of adjusting this property.
Use this property to override the classpath or configure it on you own if the copyConfigurable does not provide the results you want

Opinion: will attempt to grab from application plugin's "run" task "main" property.  Otherwise will use a project property "mainClassName".  TODO could also look for an extension
Default is false to create a fat exe.  True to create a slim exe.
Default is "console".  Otherwise it is "gui".  Gui apps will display in the taskbar.
The jar that the executable will point to.  Defaults to the arhive name from the "jar" task.  Or if "bootJar" is available.

Default Value: "", if the JavaPlugin is not loaded

Opinion: use this default, unless told otherwise.
will use empty default value here…
default will be true.  This will keep the process visible in the task manager.

Comment: A relative path from the outfile or an absolute path to the icon file. If you are uncertain use "${projectDir}/path/to/icon.ico"

Default Value: if the property is not set

Comment: A relative path from the outfile or an absolute path to the bmp splash file.
